Text: I didn't write all of the above, I'm sharing the file because I think is should be of interest to a great many people. There is too much hearsay out there, but this video (though not 100% raises some important points). It's not an all action video, but it watch it through atleast once. Kindest regards.
More bullshit! Don't waste your time.
